description: MiniTool Partition Wizard is a powerful partition management tool that allows users to resize, move, merge, and split hard drive partitions with ease. It can be particularly useful for managing recovery partitions, providing a visual representation of disk space and allowing for modifications without data loss. Users can utilize this software to check the actual free space available on their recovery partitions and determine the best course of action for resizing. The software supports a range of functions essential for efficient disk management including converting file systems, merging partitions, and recovering lost partitions. It is recommended as a complementary tool to the PowerShell command reagentc / info for helping users identify which recovery partition is in use and making informed decisions about resizing.
